statements: DELETE FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_title = 'Malware Report';
DELETE FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ReportMetadata WHERE report_source = 'External' AND analyst_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_id = 123 AND threat_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM ReportMetadata WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM ThreatIntelligenceReports WHERE report_date < '2021-09-01');
DELETE FROM MalwareSamples WHERE detected = FALSE;
DELETE FROM MalwareSamples WHERE detected = FALSE;
DELETE FROM ReportMetadata WHERE metadata_key = 'priority' AND metadata_value = 'high';
